snippet: What appeared to be an abduction in Washington Heights on Friday was a party prank, a guest told officials several days later.
abstract: New York Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly says that what had originally appeared to be a brazen daylight kidnapping of a young couple from a street in Washington Heights was in fact the beginning of a surprise birthday celebration in the Pocono Mountains for a man who had just turned 30.
lead_paragraph: What appeared to be an abduction in Washington Heights on Friday was a party prank, a guest told officials several days later.

headline.seo: Manhattan ‘Kidnapping’ Was Birthday Joke, Police Say
headline.main: Manhattan ‘Kidnapping’ Was Birthday Joke, Police Say
